resources.string:
Instructions: 


1.All questions must be answered. 
2.Each question carries one mark.
3.No time limit.
4.Should score 5 marks to qualify.
Question 1:\n\nWhich apps can be created by using Android Studio?
Question 2:\n\nWhich apps can be created by using Android Studio?
Question 3:\n\nWhich apps can be created by using Android Studio?
